title: [Sprint] Bug fixes for AST->ASR transition to compile FPM
body:

@Thirumalai-Shaktivel Please continue your sprint here. Also please **do not rebase on top of `main` branch**. I need the commits to cherry-pick in future, so please **do not change the git history of the PR**. Just add new commits and push.
